title: Why is gravitational force called central force? - Quora
tags: Why Is X Named That Way?

response.answer_text: According to the universal law of gravitation, the force of attraction between two bodies is proportional to the product of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between their centres.  Since the force is dependent on the centres of the bodies, it is also referred to as the Central Force.
